title: Form 8.3 - AGA RANGEMASTER GROUP PLC
text:
Owner or controller of interest and short positions disclosed, if different from 1(a): Name of offeror/offeree in relation to whose AGA RANGEMASTER GROUP PLC relevant securities this form relates: If an exempt fund manager connected with an offeror/offeree, state this and specify identity of In addition to the company in 1(c) above, is the discloser making NO disclosures in respect of any other party to the offer? POSITIONS OF THE PERSON MAKING THE DISCLOSURE (a) Interests and short positions in the relevant securities of the offeror or offeree to which the disclosure relates following the dealing (if any) Class of relevant security: Rights to subscribe for new securities (including directors and other executive Class of relevant security in relation to which subscription right exists Details, including nature of the rights concerned and relevant percentages: DEALINGS (IF ANY) BY THE PERSON MAKING THE DISCLOSURE Stock-settled derivative transactions (including options) (i) Writing, selling, purchasing or varying Other dealings (including subscribing for new securities) (a) Indemnity and other dealings arrangements Details of any indemnity or option arrangement, or any agreement or understanding, formal or informal, relating to relevant securities which may be an inducement to deal or refrain from dealing entered into by the person making the disclosure and any party to the offer or any person acting in concert with a party to the offer: (b) Agreements, arrangements or understandings relating to options or derivatives Details of any agreement, arrangement or understanding, formal or informal, between the person making the disclosure and any other person relating to: (i) the voting rights of any relevant securities under any option; or (ii) the voting rights of future acquisition or disposal of any relevant securities to which any derivative is referenced: Is a Supplemental Form 8 (Open Positions) attached?
